thread.title: Denise Van Outen channels Baywatch-era Pamela Anderson during Dubai beach frolic in plunging red swimsuit
thread.title_full: Denise Van Outen channels Baywatch-era Pamela Anderson during Dubai beach frolic in plunging red swimsuit

author: Janine Yaqoob
title: Denise Van Outen channels Baywatch-era Pamela Anderson during Dubai beach frolic in plunging red swimsuit
text:
Denise Van Outen looked akin to Pamela Anderson in Baywatch during her holiday in Dubai (Photo: jkpix) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A gorgeous blonde darts along a beach in a red swimsuit... but there’s no sign of David Hasselhoff anywhere. 
Ah, on second glance, it’s not Pamela Anderson in Baywatch. 
But it is Brit telly favourite Denise Van Outen , looking fit and fab as she enjoys a break in Dubai. 
The TV presenter relaxed with six-year-old Betsy, her daughter with her West End star ex Lee Mead, 35. 
Denise, 41, was staying at the Royal Meridien Hotel – a favourite with celebs and where she has been a guest before. Pamela Anderson in Baywatch Denise shows off her assets on the beach in Dubai 
But it wasn’t all fun and games as Denise also got down to some intense fitness training ahead of a gruelling charity cycle. 
She will take part in a 187-mile team bike ride in India for Brain Tumour Research next month in memory of friend Nicki Waterman, the celebrity fitness trainer who died last year at 52. Denise on the beach in Dubai (Photo: jkpix) 
It’s not the first time Denise – currently dating stockbroker Eddie Boxshall, 44 - has endured a tough challenge. 
In 2009 she climbed Tanzania’s 19,341ft Mount Kilimanjaro for Comic Relief. 
Which all helps to explain why she’s looking in the peak of health. Like us on Facebook
